title: How to kill off boosting services.
body:
Make the mmr system less shit.

Plays like a god 5 games in a row, loses 3 of them, wakes up next day plays 6th game, within 2 minutes im fully tilted and know we will lose because of the sheer stupidity of my team.

I called it 20 minutes before it happened, thats just how bad these fucking teams are.

Actually no its not my teams its my elo in general, because the reason i lose isnt because my team is bad, its because everyone is bad and thus statistically there will be atleast one person on your team that feeds, and all that needs to happen is that person feeds the wrong champion and your fucked.

This time, it was a fucking 10/2 twitch.

The kicker? i, as the adc, gave him 1 kill.

Where did the other 9 come from, it couldnt possibly be that my team sucked absolute dick.

Like gee the reason i got demoted definitely cant be because i lose twice as much lp as i gain due to my mmr being absolutely trash tier despite playing at a much higher level than the people i get matched with, thus meaning that i have to win 3 fucking games just to make up for the lp loss of 1 loss.

Like gee, that cant be it.

Oh and i know what you are thinking already "but yellow you are the only consistent factor" yes you bright spark you are right, and i consistently get tilted when retards manage to sneak into my ranked queue.

You can actually physically see with your own eyes a correlation to me playing good and my team not feeding if you go through my match history.

All the games i play like trash, someone else plays like trash too, all the games i play really really fucking well and carry, no one feeds.

There is no coincidence to that.

infact it gets worse because if you take the time to go through timelines aswell you can usually pinpoint which fucktard made me tilt, and then watch as i progressively play worse and worse in that game from that time point.

And its not because im an angry person, its because im fucking fed up of having to carry around anchors.

Im not fucking atlas, i cant carry the entire planet, if you are heavy you are heavy period.

Now if you will excuse me, that last game reallllly pissed me off, so ima go punch a wall or something and imagine its my teams face.

replies.body: Just reading your post, Is a very good indicator as to why you aren't going anywhere in ranked.. Kappa :^){{summoner:4}}
Nah hes always like this. Btw he's bronze 4

And if you ever point out why, he gets mad.

I have been trying for months, but bronzies will always be a brick wall.

coming from the guy that gets to gold 5 and stops playing ranked. every. fucking. season.

be good yourself first before thinking you're some sort of authority when it comes to telling bronzies how bad they are.

lol so what if i stop playing ranked?

Is it wrong to prefer to play with friends?

and if i can get to gold every single season, how does that make me bad?

Also kinda funny considering i have been playing ranked tonight.

you missed the point of the post. if you're gold 5 you yourself aren't particularly good. you're not in a position to be on these forums constantly calling bronze/silver people bad.

i mean, you yourself say how bad they are so it's not much of an achievement or something to brag about being slightly better than them.

come back when you're in an elo that is actually considered good.

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=YellowBrickRoad

Thats your current match histroy.


A few things to say.

1. You say youre tilted, yet when i went to check your match history, i found you were live in game. If you want to climb, dont play tilted. There are many videos and ways to attempt to untilt yourself.
2. If you tilt easily, thats a personal problem not one for anyone to fix or tolerate but you.
3. You should really look up a guide for the most optimal way to play this game. If you want to win at the game, you play it the best way possible. Taking teleport flash with warlords bloodlust and rushing runaans and bloodthirster is not optimal on any champion that im aware of.

Lastly if you do not perform consistently you WILL NOT climb. period.

see the problem is im basically perpetually tilted.

Like shit first game of the day i was tilted within the first 3 minutes.

And its mostly because this game is fucking piss easy to play.

Like i can understand if you have bad mechanics or something, i do too.

But if you cant use more than two brain cells and say "well the last 5 times i went this deep i died, maybe i should just farm under turret" then yes, i will get pissed at you.

Not because i lost the game, because with my history it could take 1 game or it could take a whole week, i will eventually repair the damage you did to my mmr.

The reason im pissed is because you came into a game, knowing full well that you literally suck at league.

And didnt think for 2 fucking seconds "am i actually ready to play ranked?"

keeping in mind when i refer to you i dont mean you specifically but the person who tilts me.

Like shit im a huge proprietor for the whole "you have to meet X performance metric before you unlock the ranked queue"

Will people get pissy because they cant play ranked? sure, but those same people shouldn't be playing ranked anyway.

It worked in world of warcraft with the silver medal proving grounds tests before you can queue for heroic dungeons in WoD.

They were piss easy to do, like shit i did the healer medal and tank medal with my DPS death knight by simply killing things faster than they can cause me to fail because im a raider so it wasn't hard to press buttons in the right order, and target the right things.

But the magic thing that happened? heroics stopped being cancer, you didnt have tanks that aggroed entire dungeons and wiped the group because the healer couldnt keep up.

You didn't have dps doing wet paper bag damage.

And you didn't have healers spamming heals on themselves and ignoring the tank.

Because my god, its almost like all the trash players were locked out of more difficult content that they couldn't cope with at that point.

And you know what, they all eventually got to play that content anyway because they got better.

By doing the tests over and over until they got their entry requirements they learned fundamental mechanics.

If they implemented that same system into league would i be able to play ranked? probably not, my cs is trash and I still lack a few core mechanics.

But id be fine with that knowing full well that if i work hard and EARN my way into ranked id be able to play a ranked that doesn't consist of literal retards.

As it currently stands im super demotivated to improve not because i dont think i can, but simply because any improvement will be for naught while im still in an elo that the only people ive seen solo carry in have been diamond players.

Like shit i queue with a gold smurf everynow and then, he cant fucking solo carry.

hes fucking gold 2.

How am i meant to carry when at best i might be silver if not b1 or b2.

Not to mention in the current elo that i play i have no room to improve on myself as it is.

These players, play worse than fucking intermediate bots.

And even intermediate bots i can easily carry and win a game, so theres literally no fucking queue that i can join to play against people at or above my skill level so i atleast have a venue to stretch myself thin and force myself to adapt.

The closest i had was when i was 1v1ing a gold player daily and you know what we discovered from that? that im actually half decent and my best skill comes in the form of positional plays, so things like poppy e's where you do some weird snowball flash e to knock them into your own turret.

The %%%% couldnt even figure out why i was bronze aside from my cs.

And even then my csing isnt too terrible because when im having a good day and im happy i will consistently hit atleast 6cs per minute up to 7 cs per minute, which isnt perfect but also isnt a far cry from the far reaching goal of 10 per minute.

Like what am i supposed to do, suddenly magically turn into faker over night so i can turbo my way to a higher elo and practice there instead?

Well from the perspective of someone who has climbed out of bronze five before, Im not going to tell you youre wrong. Im getting the point that if you spend your time and energy blaming everyone else how will you improve? 

I took a step back and changed my attitude. I educated myself about this game.

Now i agree solo carrying is extremely difficult BUT you said you have a friend who cant solo carry you out? that tells me youre apart of the problem, throughout this entire post all you have proved is that you cant see the problems with you and your play before you see your teammates mistakes.

And you getting 'pissed' doesn't improve their play at all. If i was to take you into a diamond game and you fed and got flamed you wouldnt play any better would you?

Lastly this is my last informed response for you, I wont respond again, You have totally ignored your build, choice of summoners and masteries as a starting point, im amazed your G2 friend hasnt steered you into the best way to play the role and champions youre playing.

Attitude wins games.{{summoner:1}}

Oh and just to clarify about the gold 2 solo carry thing, i didnt mean he cant solo carry me, we have an 80% win rate together and we tend to go toe to toe score wise (with him obviously beating me he is better after all)

I mean his smurf account cant break out of b2.

And to be frank half the reason we even win is because we are in voice comms together chucking banter and having a laugh.

hard to tilt when you have someone keeping you cheery.

Actually no, if i was taken into a diamond game and got flamed for doing stupid shit itd motivate me to stop doing said stupid shit.

just for context though, i do infact know how to play the game properly, its just at my current elo, i really cannot bring myself to care.

I look at bronze 5 players and i just straight up think "i could go full ap warwick adc this game, and id still have a 50/50 chance of winning"

Actually to solidify that meme, i actually have done that, went 12/5 if i recall.
If that was implemented you'd never be able to play ranked kappa :^)
You're Bronze. Of corse you and everyone else sucks.

**>**Im not fucking atlas, i cant carry the entire planet
Complaining instead of aiming for atlas mode, confirmed for never making it
Mate i dont have enough steroids to be atlas.
